text: @Bill_Morneau @JustinTrudeau Surely there are funds for 💯% of Cdns w/#Disability for the one time $600 to offset #COVID19 costs. Most living on HALF of the $2000 #CERB. Why is the Federal Gov’t (Bill #C17)excluding 60% of #PWD who live far below the #Poverty line ? #cdnpoli #CERBWontHelpMe @theJagmeetSingh
